member.name: P:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.VdfJsonConversionSettings.ObjectDuplicateKeyHandling
member.summary: Sets duplicate key handling when the corresponding value is an object or list.

member.name: P:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.VdfJsonConversionSettings.ValueDuplicateKeyHandling
member.summary: Sets duplicate key handling when the corresponding value is a singular value.

member.name: F:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.DuplicateKeyHandling.Ignore
member.summary: Ignores all duplicate keys after the first. Selecting this option will cause all duplicates to be discarded.

member.name: F:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.DuplicateKeyHandling.Merge
member.summary: Merges two JObjects or JArrays using the .Merge() method provided by Json.NET with default settings.

member.name: F:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.DuplicateKeyHandling.Replace
member.summary: Ignores all duplicate keys before the last. Selecting this option will cause all duplicates to be discarded.

member.name: F:Gameloop.Vdf.JsonConverter.DuplicateKeyHandling.Throw
member.summary: Simply throws an exception when a duplicate key is encountered. This is the default behavior.
